descriptionHtml:
[line]

[center][color=Black][size=4]by Skruf[/size][/color][/center]

[color=Black][size=3]Version :[/size][/color]0.0.7

[color=Black][size=3]Date :[/size][/color]02/02/2013

[color=Black][size=3]Category :[/size][/color]Abodes - Player homes

[line]

This mod requires the Hearthfire DLC to work.

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]A Small Playerhome near Markath[/center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Detail[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]This Mod adds a Dwemerlike Playerhome.

At this Point the House is very much a wip since this is my first mod and i'm constantly
changing almost everything and fool around with the ck ;)

[/center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Location[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]Just Outside Markarth near Salvitions Farm[/center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Known Issues and Bugs[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]If any of you guys could find the time to look over the mod and help me to find some
of those without any doubt exisitng issues it would be very much appreciated.[/center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Credits[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center][list]

[*]Custom Storage Spells

[*]EID Activators

[*]FoodContainer

[*]Modders Resource

[*]PotionRacks

[*]Unlimited Bookshelves

[/list][/center]

[line]

[list]

photoshop||S|b|26174987875]Photoshop[/url]

[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859/]TES5Edit[/url]

[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/]Nexus Mod Manager[/url]

[*]Creation Kit: Downloadable on th steam network.

[/list]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Extra Tools Used[/color][/size][/center][/u]
